title: prAna Men's Bridger Jean
description: ANYTHING JEAN: this jean is constructed from our signature organic cotton/poly blend denim that combines softness, stretch and durability

STYLE AND FIT: 5-pocket styling that’s convenient and never goes out of trend, and a modern slim fit that looks good dressed up with a collared shirt and jacket or casual with a basic tee and sneakers.
Faux suede patch at back waistband

The prAna Bridger Jean for men is constructed from our signature organic cotton/poly blend denim that combines softness, stretch, and durability. These jeans are cut for a slim fit at the thigh with classic 5-pocket styling in a range of inseams to allow for cuffing.
